value.title: Incremental Refresh with Integers in Power BI
value.excerpt: How do you use integer date keys with Incremental Refresh in Power BI??? Patrick walks you through how to do it.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-incremental-refresh  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/increfreshsample  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Introducing Power BI Premium Gen2 Preview (Dec 2020)
value.excerpt: At Microsoft Ignite, we found out about Power BI Premium Gen2. It's now available for you to use and WOW! It has changed the game! Adam walks you through what the changes are to help you level up.  Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-what-is#power-bi-premium-generation-2-preview

value.title: Introducing Power BI Premium Per User (Preview)
value.excerpt: Are you curious what Power BI Premium Per User is all about? Adam walks you through how to get it and what it means from a user experience. Take advantage of Power BI Premium features without the Premium capacity price!  Announcement Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-premium-per-user-public-preview-now-available/

value.title: Is a parameter filtered in Power BI Paginated Reports???
value.excerpt: How do you know if a parameter was filtered in your Power BI Paginated Reports? Was a slicer used in the Power BI report that is using the Paginated visual? Adam shows you a way you can find out!  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.excerpt: We reduced a Power BI dataset size by 83% by doing one simple thing. It's time to get serious about your data model! value.title: Manage Custom Visual purchases for Power BI
value.excerpt: It used to be a bit of a struggle to purchase a custom visual for more than yourself. Adam looks at some of the changes for Power BI Custom Visuals in AppSource to help you purchase and manage licenses for your organization.  Introducing a new way to purchase licensed Power BI visuals and manage licenses

value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. value.title: Preventing Data Silos with Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick and Kalyn look at data silos and how to prevent it using Power BI. Different options exist, such as Analysis Services, Azure Analysis Services or models hosted in the Power BI service.  LET'S CONNECT!
